item.title: Too Old, Too Uneducated: Aging Workers in Beijing Struggle for Work
item.description: China’s economic slowdown has fallen especially hard on older migrant workers, who often don’t have the technical skills that employers are seeking.

item.title: With Little Explanation, Trump Throws Wind Industry Into Chaos
item.description: The Trump administration is halting wind projects that had been approved, financed and underway while providing little to no justification.
